comment.author: 80878055@N00
comment._content: Photograph taken at Crozier Hall beside St. mark's Church of Ireland, Armagh.

comment.author: 66354741@N00
comment._content:
My mother's maiden name was Clusker.  I have the naturalization papers from Scotland of her Father, James Patrick Clusker.  There are no Cluskers in Alabama, USA where I live.  Do you know if these families are connected in some way?
Thanks,
Susan

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content:
Sorry for our late reply to you, Susan. We would need more information in order to help you out. Do you have a connection to Calverts from Armagh - as depicted in the photograph? 
If you have a general genealogical enquiry you may wish to contact our Enquiries Team at: proni@dcalni.gov.uk
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
